get.description: Gets all attendees owned by the specified user.

parameters.name: externalID
parameters.description: The external ID of an attendee. By entering a value for this parameter, you can limit the results to the attendees who match the specified external ID. Up to 10 comma-separated external IDs may be specified.

parameters.name: attendeeTypeID
parameters.description: The ID of an attendee type. By entering a value for this parameter, you can limit the results to the attendees who match the specified type.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value: 25

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

get.summary: Get a single attendee by ID
get.description: Gets a single attendee by ID.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

put.description: Updates the specified attendee. Only the fields provided in the supplied object are updated. Missing fields are not altered.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The partial or complete Attendee object to update.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendee to delete.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user that has added the attendee to an expense. The user who is performing this API request must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

NextPage.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

AttendeeTypeCode.description: A code that indicates the type of attendee. Examples: EMPLOYEE, SPOUSE, BUSGUEST. Maximum length: 40 characters

AttendeeTypeID.description: The ID of the attendee type. To obtain the attendee type ID value, use the GET /expense/attendeetypes endpoint. The value of the ID element in the response is the attendee type ID.

Company.description: The name of the attendee's company. Maximum length: 150 characters

CurrencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for monetary amounts related to an attendee.

ExternalID.description: A unique identifier for the attendee, assigned outside of Concur. Maximum length: 48 characters

FirstName.description: The attendee's first name. Maximum length: 50 characters

HasExceptionsPrevYear.description: Determines whether the attendee had exceptions in the previous year, based on yearly total limits for attendees. Format: true or false

HasExceptionsYTD.description: Determines whether the attendee has exceptions in the current year, based on yearly total limits for attendees. Format: true or false

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

LastName.description: The attendee's last name. Maximum length: 132 characters

MiddleInitial.description: The attendee's middle initial. Maximum length: 1 character

OwnerLoginID.description: The login ID of the user who owns the attendee record.

OwnerName.description: The name of the user who owns the attendee record.

Suffix.description: The attendee's name suffix. Maximum length: 32 characters

Title.description: The attendee's title. Maximum length: 32 characters

TotalAmountPrevYear.description: The total amount spent on the attendee in the previous calendar year.

TotalAmountYTD.description: The total amount spent on the attendee in the current calendar year.

AttendeeTypeID.description: The ID of the attendee type. To obtain the attendee type ID value, use the GET /expense/attendeetypes endpoint. The value of the ID element in the response is the attendee type ID.

Company.description: The name of the attendee's company. Maximum length: 150 characters

CurrencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for monetary amounts related to an attendee.
